resources.string: Throughout the entire park, cards are hidden in stations. Find these cards by paying close attention to sounds and lights. When you have found a card station, there will be a display showing how many cards are left, and a display that shows a code. Enter the code you see on the display below and you will gain your card!
Are you in team Blue or Red?
Your opponent is ready and waiting!
You have won 5 rounds more than your opponent. As a reward you can receive a card!

The purpose of this app is to entertain people on their way to a different attraction. With this app you can collect different kinds of cards each with a fun interesting fact on the back.

You can collect cards by redeeming a code you can find at a collection station. These stations are all around the Essteling. You can enter the code and after that if you click redeem you should see a card popup on your screen. You can also get a card by winning against someon at a battle station.

When you come across a battle station and you want to battle you can fill in the number of the battle station click on a color and after that click on the connect button. When someon else also connect to this station you can battle with him/her. The battle works by clicking on a button on the battle station this button corresponds to a card in your app. The battle is like rock paper scissors each card has a type SWORD beats BOW, BOW beats SHIELD and SHIELD beats SWORD.
